CustomField.description: Issues to be resolved before the Payee can be included in a 2cloudnine Pay Batch
CustomField.formula: If ( ISBLANK ( tc9_pr__Employee__c ) , "No Contact" &BR() , "" ) & If ( ISBLANK ( tc9_pr__Payment_Entity__c ) , "No Payment Entity" & BR() , "" ) & If ( ISBLANK ( tc9_pr__Schedule__c ) , "No Schedule" &BR() , "" ) & If ( ISBLANK ( TEXT(tc9_pr__Payment_Consolidation__c) ) , "Payment Consolidation is blank" & BR() , "" ) & If ( NOT ISBLANK(tc9_pr__Payment_Details_Incomplete_reason__c), tc9_pr__Payment_Details_Incomplete_reason__c &BR(),"") & If ( ISBLANK ( tc9_pr__Payroll_Start_Date__c ) , "No Payroll Start Date" &BR() , "" )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Issues to be resolved before the Payee can be included in a 2cloudnine Pay Batch
CustomField.label: Payee Incomplete Reasons
